action.mouse_action: The user is clicking and dragging the bottom border of one of the calendar entries to resize or move it.
action.general_scene_description: The screenshot shows a calendar application open on a computer. The current week being displayed is November 11th to 17th, 2024, and the selected day is Saturday, November 16th. The time is set to sometime after 1 PM.  There are several calendar entries present, with text partially visible for some entries.  One highlighted event is being resized or moved by the user, and it has the partially visible title "Client Meeting: Fujitsu" and "Important Meeting with".
